meanings.definition: A person who shares a bunk or sleeping quarters with another.
meanings.sent1: My bunkmate and I stay in the same room.
meanings.sent2: I have a new bunkmate at camp this summer.
meanings.sent3: My bunkmate always tells funny jokes before bed.
meanings.sent4: Being a bunkmate is like having a sleepover every night.
meanings.sent5: I can always count on my bunkmate for a good chat before sleep.

meanings.definition: To share a bunk or sleeping quarters with another person.
meanings.sent1: I bunkmate with my best friend during our camping trips.
meanings.sent2: We bunkmate together whenever we have sleepovers.
meanings.sent3: Let's bunkmate for the night and share stories.
meanings.sent4: Bunkmating with someone can create lasting memories.
meanings.sent5: I enjoy bunkmating with friends to stay up late talking.
